title: Can We Get Married?
resume: Can We Get Married? is a 2012 South Korean television series starring Sung Joon, Jung So-min, Lee Mi-sook, Han Groo, and Kim Young-kwang. It aired on jTBC from October 29, 2012 to January 1, 2013 on Mondays and Tuesdays at 23:00 for 20 episodes. The romantic comedy explores the themes of love, marriage and family against the backdrop of a young couple preparing to get married in 100 days.
